questions.question: I ……………………….. the manager in the afternoon.
questions.description: We use the present continuous to talk about a future event that is already planned.

questions.question: I ………………………… his voice.
questions.description: The verb like is hardly ever used in the continuous form.

questions.question: I called him because I …………………………. to talk.
questions.description: Want is not normally used in the continuous form.

questions.question: It ……………………………. hard.
questions.description: The present continuous is used to talk about actions or situations that are going on at the moment of speaking.

questions.question: I ………………………….. that education should be free for all.
questions.description: Believe is not normally used in the continuous form.

questions.question: I ………………………….. that we are committing a mistake.
questions.description: When feel means have an opinion, it is not normally used in the continuous form.

questions.question: I ………………………….. how to ride a bicycle.
questions.description: Know is not normally used in the continuous form.

questions.question: I ………………………… my holidays right now.
questions.description: The present continuous is used to talk about ongoing situations.

questions.question: She …………………………… when they arrived.
questions.description: The past continuous is used to talk about the longer background action that was in progress when another action occurred.

questions.question: It ………………………… difficult now.
questions.description: Look is not normally used in the continuous form.

questions.question: He …………………………… to a hill tribe.
questions.description: Belong is not normally used in the continuous form.
